content: if you want to try this pattern this is the information the finished snoopy from charlie brown books is exactly 8 tall 2 1/2 wide at the body and 5 1/4 wide at the arms snoopy is mini compared to some other patterns i see on ravelry and is entirely made up the snoopy i made is an off white and a midnight black i do not know what kind the yarn is but it feels like a super saver so i put that on there the finished product includes quite a bit of sewing and embroidery happy crocheting single_crochet = single_crochet mc = magic_ring fo = finish off 1 aro = 1 single_crochet in each stitch around st = stitch decrease = decrease increase = increase good grief
